articles.title: 5 asteroids, including a 200-foot monster, approaching Earth over the next 48 hours, NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: Prepare for some really celestial encounters as 5 huge asteroids approach Earth within the next 48 hours, varying in size from an airplane to a house, with potential impact concerns.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: IFA 2023: the biggest announcements from Europe's big tech show - The Verge
articles.description: IFA, Europe’s big tech show, is the place to be to see all the year’s big smart home announcements. Expect robot vacuum cleaners, smart lights, and smart locks.
articles.content: CES may rule the roost in the States, but over in Europe, its IFA that serves as the years biggest tech trade show. It means were likely to see plenty of product announcements, as well as showcases t… [+14123 chars]

articles.title: Scientists detect and validate the longest-period exoplanets found with TESS - Phys.org
